n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = sum(a)

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == s - a[i]:
        print(i+1, end=' ')

print()

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = sum(a)

ans = []
for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == s - a[i]:
        ans.append(i+1)

print(len(ans))
print(*ans)
